summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the French subscription comparison app after fixing Vite configuration issue. All core features are working correctly.

resolved_issues.issue: Blocked request error due to missing allowedHosts configuration

passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with Hero section
Hero title displays: 'Tes abonnements te coûtent vraiment combien ?'
CTA button 'Voir le vrai prix' works and scrolls to comparison section
Navbar navigation is functional with 10 navigation links
Comparison section loads with 50+ subscription cards
Netflix subscription card found and clickable
Duration selector buttons (1 an, 3 ans, 5 ans, 10 ans) are functional
Category filters (Streaming vidéo, Musique, Tout) are operational
View mode toggle between Grid and Chart views works
Netflix detail page shows pricing, features, and back navigation
Custom calculator section ('Calcule tes dépenses') is present
Savings tips section ('Comment économiser') is visible
